nodes.text: Kile II was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories within the Jospro sector with many basins, canyons, deserts, and huge pits, due to its intense seismic activity. It was an Imperial sector capital, and home to the Enclave, an enormous facility that supported the Empire's naval operations in the sector.
The terrain was mostly basins, deserts, and canyons. The Galactic Empire also established the Enclave to support naval operations in the Jospro sector.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance's flight group Rogue Squadron launched an assault on the Imperial Spaceport, barracks, and long range sensor outpost, in an attempt to hamper Imperial operations in the area.
